body_html:
Workaround/Fix: The problem goes away if you use static methods, as done in the docs here:
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/notes/extending.html#extending-torch-autograd

I don't know which version is preferred, the one using static methods from the docs, or the one using instance methods from the tutorials. If the latter is deprecated, I guess this is not a big issue.

body:
Workaround/Fix: The problem goes away if you use static methods, as done in the docs here:
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/notes/extending.html#extending-torch-autograd

I don't know which version is preferred, the one using static methods from the docs, or the one using instance methods [from the tutorials](http://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/pytorch_with_examples.html#pytorch-defining-new-autograd-functions). If the latter is deprecated, I guess this is not a big issue.
